statistician: The numbers tell the story here - 78% completion rate in the red zone tells you everything.
If you look at the EPA per play, this offense ranks in the top 5 league-wide.
The efficiency metrics are off the charts - 8.3 yards per attempt is ELITE.
According to Pro Football Focus, this is the highest-graded performance of the season.
The data doesn't lie - target share of 32% makes this the clear optimal play.
historian: This performance reminds me of Montana in his prime - the footwork, the vision.
Back in the day, we called this a legacy game. History is being made.
You have to go back to the 1996 season to find a comparable stretch.
Hall of fame trajectory right here - mark my words, we're witnessing greatness.
The legends of the game would tip their caps to this performance.

analyst: If you watch the tape, the footwork on that play was immaculate.
The pre-snap read was beautiful - he identified the coverage immediately.
That route concept is why this offense is so difficult to defend.
Watch the technique on the coverage breakdown - textbook stuff.
The film shows consistent execution of this concept all season.
